article.title: Nebraska U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Nebraska U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​Omaha Office Contact Information

Meredith Bond, Director​
6708 Pine Street (Mammel Hall)
Room 205
Omaha, Nebraska
Phone: 402-597-0193 | Mobile: 402-680-4261 | Fax: 402-554-3473
Email:meredith.bond@trade.gov

Mailing address:

UNO Mammel Hall Suite 200
Omaha, NE 68182-0248

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the Nebraska U.S. Export Assistance Center.
